entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Title #43700
  • Migrate off of using `$(OS)` in favor of explicit System.OperatingSystem checks in the build targets #43693
  • Tamam #43689
  • Update sdk to use new Arcade .deb creation tooling #43688
  • 'Microsoft/Microsoft.h' file not found issue in .net maui project #43686
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24470.13] Fail to build Text-Grab App with CS0116, CS1514, CS1022, CS0118, CS0103 error . #43680
  • Support Json format for `dotnet new list` #43679

Closed

  • Problem with `dotnet restore` on Windows 11 ARM (via Mac / Parallels) #43691

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Lock comments for Windows setup #43699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always disable NuGet auditing in source-only build #43696
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] BinSkim: Enable CFG #43695
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add pass 2 specifications for sdk projects #43694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #43690
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Test the new nuget restore #43687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43677
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Report msbuild diagnostics as warnings/errors. #43571
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2546652 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime, dotnet/aspnetcore and windowsdesktop codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve logging from agent #43672
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • fix parsing of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature
  • Support additional VS component IDs for workloads #43675
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43673
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
